patthana23.18:4.1: Nakusalo naajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.18:4.3: Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā soḷasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte atthiyā avigate nava.
patthana23.18:5.1: Nakusalo nabahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana23.18:5.3: Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā cha, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte atthiyā avigate nava.
patthana23.18:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.18:7.1: Nakusalaṃ nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
